description:
Gives strengthen which gives 3x damage
The damage boost must be >70 to use this.
name: Holy Strength
note:
<Cooldown: 3>
<CTB After Speed: 100%>
<JS Skill Enable>
 // Get the value of the first game variable (Variable ID 1)
 const variableValue = $gameVariables.value(1);

 // Calculate the last two digits using the modulo operator
 const lastTwoDigits = variableValue % 100;

 // Set the 'enabled' variable.
 // The skill is enabled only if the last two digits are greater than 50.
 enabled = lastTwoDigits > 70;
</JS Skill Enable>

description: Small cure
name: Cure 1
note:
<JS Targets>
// Clear any default targets based on scope (like "1 Ally")
targets = [];

// 'user' is the Game_Battler object for the skill user
const allies = user.friendsUnit().aliveMembers();

if (allies.length === 0) {
  // No alive allies to target
  return;
}

let lowestHpAlly = null;
let lowestHpPercent = Infinity; // Start with a very high number

for (const ally of allies) {
  if (ally.mhp > 0) { // Ensure Max HP is not zero to avoid division by zero
    const currentHpPercent = ally.hp / ally.mhp;
    if (currentHpPercent < lowestHpPercent) {
      lowestHpPercent = currentHpPercent;
      lowestHpAlly = ally;
    }
    // Optional: Tie-breaking rule if multiple allies have the same lowest %HP.
    // For example, if two allies are at 10% HP, this picks the first one found.
    // You could add more logic here, e.g., if currentHpPercent === lowestHpPercent,
    // then pick the one with lower absolute HP, or higher LUK, etc.
    // For simplicity, this current version picks the first one encountered.
  }
}

if (lowestHpAlly) {
  targets.push(lowestHpAlly); // Add the single lowest HP ally to the target list
}
// The 'targets' array is now modified and will be used by the action.
</JS Targets>

description: much better cure
name: Cure 2
note:
<JS Targets>
// Clear any default targets based on scope (like "1 Ally")
targets = [];

// 'user' is the Game_Battler object for the skill user
const allies = user.friendsUnit().aliveMembers();

if (allies.length === 0) {
  // No alive allies to target
  return;
}

let lowestHpAlly = null;
let lowestHpPercent = Infinity; // Start with a very high number

for (const ally of allies) {
  if (ally.mhp > 0) { // Ensure Max HP is not zero to avoid division by zero
    const currentHpPercent = ally.hp / ally.mhp;
    if (currentHpPercent < lowestHpPercent) {
      lowestHpPercent = currentHpPercent;
      lowestHpAlly = ally;
    }
    // Optional: Tie-breaking rule if multiple allies have the same lowest %HP.
    // For example, if two allies are at 10% HP, this picks the first one found.
    // You could add more logic here, e.g., if currentHpPercent === lowestHpPercent,
    // then pick the one with lower absolute HP, or higher LUK, etc.
    // For simplicity, this current version picks the first one encountered.
  }
}

if (lowestHpAlly) {
  targets.push(lowestHpAlly); // Add the single lowest HP ally to the target list
}
// The 'targets' array is now modified and will be used by the action.
</JS Targets>
